name: Supabase
description: Integrate with Supabase to query, insert, update and more.
author: agenticmail

tools.name: Query
tools.description: Query rows from a Supabase table using PostgREST syntax. Supports select, filtering, ordering, and pagination.

tools.name: Insert
tools.description: Insert one or more rows into a Supabase table. Returns the inserted rows.

tools.name: Update
tools.description: Update rows in a Supabase table matching a filter. Returns the updated rows.

tools.name: Delete
tools.description: Delete rows from a Supabase table matching a filter. Returns the deleted rows.

tools.name: Rpc
tools.description: Call a Supabase database function (RPC). Pass the function name and an optional parameter object.

projectRef.label: Project Reference
projectRef.description: Supabase project reference ID (found in project URL)
